title: Hold
description: Convicted by the Coalition of a minor crime, Riana is sentenced to life on a prison planet â€” no order, no safety, just a primitive hold filled with criminals vying for dominance. The only way Riana can survive is to give herself to the strongest man there in return for protection. By desperate instinct, she chooses a mysterious, handsome loner named Cain. She offers him her body and can only hope he'll be able to protect her from the other inmates who circle her like beasts.She never dreams she will come to take pleasure in Cain. Or want to offer him her heart as well as her body.
author: Zannie Adams
